about_the_game:
Christmas Bazaar - Manager Simulator is a relaxed first-person simulation game where every aspect of running a Christmas Bazaar comes to life.

Christmas Bazaar Management

Create and design your business with an eye for both efficiency and aesthetics. Decide where to place products, manage the layout of your aisles, and make sure your customers have a smooth shopping experience.

Supply Goods

Use an in-game tablet to order stock. Unpack items, organize your storage room, and place products on the shelves.

Cashier

Scan items, handle cash transactions, and ensure that customers leave happy with their shopping and checkout experience.

Free Market

Navigate the challenges of a real-time market. Purchase products when prices are low, and set the best selling prices to balance customer satisfaction with profit margins.

Grow

As you earn profits, reinvest them wisely. Expand your bazaar's physical space, upgrade your facilities, and continually adapt to the ever-changing demands of the retail industry.

In Christmas Bazaar - Manager Simulator, every decision you make counts. Will you be able to transform a simple bazaar into a magical Christmas wonderland, while balancing customer satisfaction and financial success?
